					[1749] cell "Product Quick Look Now you can use one spotting scope for multiple applications without the hassle of removing or swapping parts! with its 0-90-degree eyepiece range, the Orion grandview vari-angle 20-60x60mm spotter can quickly switch between straight-through viewing for target practice, Degree viewing for observing the Moon and stars, or any angle between 0 and Degree for comfortable daytime viewing of the horizon. This unique flexibility gives the grandview vari-angle spotting scope a big advantage over fixed-orientation spotters, since you get to decide which viewing angle is best for your particular observing needs. WHAT'S more, this high-end instrument also features a rotating tripod socket for even more eyepiece orientation control. With its adjustable 20-60x zoom eyepiece, this spotting scope will let you Survey wider areas at 20-power with a 1.Degree field-of-view, and take closer looks at 60-power with a 1.Degree field. Helpful markings around the eyepiece let you quickly switch between 20x, 30x, 40x, 50x and 60x magnification. This powerful spotter can focus on objects as close as 20 feet (6M) away. The grandview vari-angle spotting scope's long eye relief range of 31-18.5mm allows comfortable use while wearing eyeglasses, and a rubber pop-down eyecup and extendable sun shade helps prevent peripheral light and glare from disrupting viewing sessions. The exit pupil ranges from 3mm at 20x to 1mm at 60x. The Orion grandview vari-angle 20-60x60mm spotter features fully multi coated optics which transmit the maximum amount of light to the eyepiece for bright, high contrast views. Contrast is further optimized thanks to internal baffle rings and a flat-black interior. A thread-on objective lens cap and friction-fit eyepiece cap keep the spotting scope's lenses clean, and an included aluminum-clad hard carry case with custom dive-cut foam insert keeps the 60mm spotter safe during transport and storage. Weighs 3.6 lbs. Super-versatile spotter lets you view straight-through, at 45-deg, at 90-deg or at any angle between zero and 90 with its unique adjustable-angle eyepiece Switch between lower and higher magnification easily with the 20-60x continuous zoom eyepiece Fully multi-coated Optics Transmit maximum light for bright, clear views Includes Deluxe aluminum-clad hard carry case with dive-cut foam interior Weighs 3.6 lbs"

					[1791] cell 'Product Quick Look Installing optic plate to handgun is NOT recommended for users that are not familiar with pistol assembly. This optic plate requires removal of the rear sight, dissemble the pistol slide to reach the screw hole underneath. Gunsmith experience is required. We recommend hiring a professional gunsmith. Please note. Unprofessional installation such as improper torque will result in screw loose, not holding zero, damage to the firearm/optic and personal injury. Comes with a ADE RD3-006 Green dot, a Picatinny plate and a pistol optic plate to REPLACE the rear sight of G2c, G2s, G2, PT111 G2, Millennium G2, and TX22 Pistols.This plate also fits Taurus G3 with Original Rear sight(see photo) We are listening! Based on customer feedback, we are now sending the new production that has 45 degree edge, it simply slide into the dovetail slot without needing to file the edge like the old product plate that has 90 degree. The pistol plate does NOT fit G3 with NEWER FACTORY STEEL SIGHT, G3C, please search ADE G3C plate on amazon under different listing. This GREEN dot comes with a picatinny mounting plate pre-assembled (might be packaged separately in the retail package, depends on the ADE model). Please use the allen wrench provided to take out the 2 hex screws(M3x6mm) on the top behind the glass frame. It will disconnect the red dot from the picatinny mounting plate. You will then be able to attach the red dot to a variety of handgun mounting plates 4 MOA. Operates with a single CR2032 battery(installed underneath). Multiple brightness setting. 1000 hours battery life on the brightest setting. Auto turns off after 4 hours. Approximately 1.01"H x 1.9"L x 1.1W Comes with protective cover, screws, wrenches, instructions, lens cloth, anti flickering shim. Full metal construction with glass lens. No plastic body, no plastic lens. Installing optic plate to handgun is NOT recommended for users that are not familiar with pistol assembly. This optic plate requires removal of the rear sight, dissemble the pistol slide to reach the screw hole underneath. Gunsmith experience is required. We recommend hiring a professional gunsmith. Please note. Unprofessional installation such as improper torque will result in screw loose, not holding zero, damage to the firearm/optic and personal injury.'

					[1836] cell 'Product Description DIY Digital Night Vision Scope for Rifle Hunting BHNDOING DIY Night Vision Scope for riflescopes BHNDOING DIY Night Vision is a light weight rear mounted night vision add on that allows you to quickly and easily convert your day scope into a state of the art night vision rifle scope for close and long range hunting day or night. 720P HD colour Day-time and 720P HD Night-time. Please kindly note: The BHNDOING night vision scope is not scope;Rather, it is a system that you can use with your rifle scope as a night sighting system. There are separate parts that, when combined, create a complete system you can attach to your scope. Features of Night Vision Scope for riflescopes Easy to install DIY Night Vision for Rifle Scope Night Vision Scope for riflescopes BHNDOING BHNDOING Intellectually designed night vision device-indispensable for hunting BHNDOING DIY Night Vision Scope for riflescopes Make your hunting experience more beautiful and Meaningful What\'s in the package? Batteries are not included in the package due to transportation restrictions 1X 5" HD 720P Display 1X Day/Night Camera 1X IR L(a)ser flashlight 1X IR Mount 2X Ring Mount 1X Screwdriver 1X Camouflage Wrap Product Quick Look FCC product certification: BHNDOING Night Vision for Rifle Scope Statement: The materials and construction are in compliance with the FCC standard.You can view in product guides and documents certificate.'

					[2010] cell "Product Description night vision scope Explore The World, Day and Night If you're looking for an affordable, effective and fun way to explore the outdoors in the dark, our night vision is a perfect choice. 5x optical zoom and 8x digital zoom enable you to see clearly up to 220 yards at night. Don’t let darkness stop you from seeing the world around you! Night Vision Monocular The ACPOTEL NV01 Night Vision Monocular is compact and lightweight; it has a broad vision view, clear image, and easy to carry advantages; it is your best choice for hunting, bird watching, hiking, etc. PACKAGES: 1 x Digital Night Vision, 1 x 8GB Memory Card , 1 x USB Cable , 1 x Microfiber Cleaning Cloth , 1 x Objective Lens Shelter , 1 x External Power Adapter , 1 x Carrying Case , 1 x Lithium Battery , 1 x Hand Grip Strip, 1 x Shoulder Strip, 1 x Instruction Manual ACPOTEL NIGHT VISION MONOCULAR ACPOTEL Night Vision HD Scopes Specifications Magnification: 5x Digital Magnification: 8x Observing Distance (Full Dark): 2.18~218Yards Sensor: Low illumination HD 1/3 COMS Pixel: 130W Photo: 1280x1024 Video: 720P NV01 Night Vision Monocular Features HD Image: The monocular uses all-optical glasses and FMC coating, it has about 99.9% light transmittance. Available Daytime & Nighttime: It adopts a low-light HD 1/3 COMS sensor, makes it recognize darker light, and also has energy-saving than using the booster tube. Rechargeable: It comes with a rechargeable lithium battery and you can charge quickly by connecting the 3.7V/700mAh adapter or computer with a USB cable. Auto Shut Off: The night vision device will be turned off if there is no operation within 180 seconds, you don’t always have to worry about it running out of power."
